title: CPA, Khulna Shipyard sign MoU
body: A memorandum of understanding was signed between the Chittagong Port Authority and Khulna Shipyard Limited in the boardroom of port authority on Monday. Commodore Kawsar Rashid, CPA member-engineering and Commodore Shahidullah Al Faruk, managing director of Khulna Shipyard signed the agreement on behalf of their respective organisations, said a press release on Tuesday. The agreement was signed to continue the supply of high-tech rubber items produced by Khulna Shipyard Limited in its rubber factory, which are used in various fields under various departments of the port authority. The Memorandum of Understanding was signed by Commodore Ahmed Amin Abdullah, member of the port for harbour and marine, and the heads of departments of the port authority, were also present.
